body_html:
If making API changes I encourage sooner rather than later. They should be backwards compatible. I'll move rnncells back to core soon and it will be harder to make changes after that.
…

body:
If making API changes I encourage sooner rather than later. They should be
backwards compatible. I'll move rnncells back to core soon and it will be
harder to make changes after that.

On May 4, 2017 10:38 AM, "Chris Hoyean Song" <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> If there is no volunteer yet, can I try this issue?
> I reviewed source codes of GRUCell, LSTMCell, and LayerNormBasicLSTMCell.
> I think I can give it a shot.
>
> —
